txt.en: This large, white flower is beautiful to behold, but most wondrous of all is that it is growing in the barren and corrupt earth of the Brown Lands.\n\nThe Ent Gnarlstump will surely want to see this.

'What is this that you have found, little [placeholder]? Hoom! This flower is of a breed grown by Fimbrethil, mate of the eldest of my kind.\n\n'While it does not speak of the passage of the Entwives, Fangorn will be pleased to know such flowers still live in this world.'
You found a lone white flower growing in the desolation of the Entwives' gardens...the only living thing you have seen, other than briars, growing in the Brown Lands.
Gnarlstump can be found near the desolation of the Entwives' gardens in the Brown Lands.\n\nYou should bring the flower to Gnarlstump at once.
